attributes.action: stop Betfair profiting from trap bets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Betfair have introduced a new robot where Betfair punters are no longer betting against each other, they are betting against Betfair.  Until this was introduced on February 18th 2008, if you submitted a bet at the wrong price, Betfair users got the chance to cancel often most of the bet they placed in error.  Betfair however are themselves betting with a zero second delay, and profiting risk free from their own user errors.  

This is a petition for Betfair to give the risk free profit they make from their trap bot from Betfair customers who enter a bet at the wrong odds in error, back to the victims.  

It is wrong for a betting exchange to scalp risk free huge sums of money from users who have placed a bet in error, and all money scalped by Betfair in these circumstances should be refunded to the victim.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
